mapper.select: select fpc.*, fp.title AS projectName, fp.image, IFNULL(fi.name, "æ— ") AS inheritorName, fc.title AS classifyName from f_project_collect AS fpc left join f_project AS fp on fpc.project_id = fp.id left join f_inheritor AS fi on fp.inheritor_id = fi.id left join f_project_classify AS fc on fp.classify_id = fc.id where fpc.user_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
